item.title: CVE-2023-48770|2023-12-14T16:51:54.705Z -- nima%20saberi -- aparat
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Nima Saberi Aparat allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Aparat: from n/a through 1.7.1.
